pkgmetadata.longdescription: Retrieve Archived Web Pages from the 'Internet Archive' // Scraping content from archived web pages stored in the 'Internet Archive' (https://archive.org) using a systematic workflow. Get an overview of the mementos available from the respective homepage, retrieve the Urls and links of the page and finally scrape the content. The final output is stored in tibbles, which can be then easily used for further analysis.
